title: Purchase and create account
custom_preconds: Given a user has onboarded and made a purchase
custom_steps: WHEN they create an an account
custom_expected: THEN they will navigate to the home screen and be given proper entitlements

title: Paywall page
custom_steps: WHEN they land on the paywall page
custom_expected:
THEN they will see the subscription options and pricing
AND they should be able choose one of the subscription options to purchase

title: Free anonymous user  Get MLB.TV
custom_preconds: Given a logged out user (who has chosen the Explore Free Content at on-boarding welcome options)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they navigate to the settings screen and click Get MLBTV
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEY will be presented with the welcome options screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they click the GET MLB.TV button in the top menu
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEY will be presented with the welcome options screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they click a game with a live or archived feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a modal will be presented with a Get MLB.TV button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks the Get MLB.TV button from the live or archived game modal
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEY will be presented with the paywall

title: Restore Purchase
custom_preconds: Given a user who is onboarding

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a purchase is recognized from the play store
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be presented with a modal to login or create an account.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they create an account or log in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will navigate to the home screen and be given proper entitlements

title: Free/logged in user purchases through Settings- Upgrade MLB.TV
custom_preconds: Given a user who logs in to an existing free account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they click Upgrade MLB.TV in Settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be presented with the paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they purchase MLB.TV from the paywall
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will navigate to the home screen and be given proper entitlements

title: Onboarding free user makes purchase
custom_preconds: Given a user has onboarded and made a purchase
custom_steps: WHEN they login to an existing free account
custom_expected: THEN they will navigate to the home screen and be given proper entitlements

title: Logged out user makes a purchase
custom_preconds:
Given a logged out user 
AND they navigate to the select Get MLBTV
AND they select Browse subscriptions

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I've successfully made a purchase
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will be sent to create account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I successfully create my account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will navigate to the home screen and be given proper entitlements

title: Purchase and exit app before creating account/logging in
custom_preconds:
Given a user has onboarded and made a purchase
AND has exited the app before creating an account or logging in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they return to the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be presented with a modal to login or create an account.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they create an account or log in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will navigate to the home screen and be given proper entitlements

title: User Upgrades MLB App from an IAP purchase
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a User makes an In App Purchase on a prior version of the app

NOTE: This test case is untestable for Amazon due to the nature of their IAP in Live App testing. Only one version at a time can be tested.
custom_steps: WHEN the user upgrades app from the previous version
custom_expected: THEN the user will be granted the proper entitlements in the upgraded version of the app (user should have access to out of market game feeds and SVOD content)
